parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Perhaps from the base of chraomai; gold; by extension, a golden article, as an ornament or coin.
And, even, also, namely.
Silver as a metal. From argos; silver.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To rust; pass: To be rusted, tarnished. From kata and a derivative of ios; to rust down, i.e. Corrode.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Poison, rust; an arrow. Perhaps from eimi or hiemi; rust; also venom.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of martus; something evidential, i.e. evidence given or, the Decalogue.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to eat.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To store up, treasure up, save, lay up. From thesauros; to amass or reserve.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
